column4: i added all the repositories by following the wiki instructions but it doesnt seem to be working, can someone give me a hand ?
/etc/apt/sources.list
it depends on the package, and why it's broken
paste the error from an apt-get -f install
that is, sudo apt-get -f install
i was trying to intall mplayer and im having some dependency problems
that does not sound good; paste both the above, and the contents of /etc/apt/sources.list

get rid of the warty repository, that's your problem
otherwise, those sources are very nice

next, go to http://wiki.ubuntu.com/MplayerInstallHowto
could you paste your /etc/apt/sources.list to a paste bin?
you're missing a line: deb http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ dapper main restricted
also, you might want to comment out the cdrom line (put a # at the beginning)
whups, change the dapper in that line to breezy
good
in general, sudo apt-get -f install
